description: Main entry point for a Flutter attendance tracking application, initializing app, managing state, theme, routing, and UI components.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget managing app initialization and theming.

classes.name: _MyAppState
classes.description: State for MyApp, handles post-frame initialization trigger.

classes.name: _AppContent
classes.description: Wrapper for the main app content; displays the root switcher.

classes.name: _InstantSplash
classes.description: Lightweight splash screen shown during initialization.

classes.name: RootSwitcher
classes.description: Decides whether to show login or main app based on authentication.

classes.name: HomeShell
classes.description: Main authenticated user interface with navigation and user info.

classes.name: _HomeShellState
classes.description: State management for the HomeShell, handles tab navigation.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point; initializes environment, loads config, and runs the app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds widgets for various UI components in multiple classes (_MyAppState, _AppContent, etc.).
